page.title: 19BARKSTON ASH PEOPLE'S VIEWS
page.content: Of the people interviewed ages ranged from 45 to 70.The length of residence was between 20 and 40 years, an average of 25 years. 60% lived in a new house. 65% of those interviewed worked, 35% were housewives. Clubs and societies available,Youth Club, Young Farmers, Womens Institute and Cricket Club.A Mobile Library comes to the village every Thursday.40% use clubs and societies. 30% of workers travel 20 miles or more a day to work. A car is essential as the bus is twice daily,or there is a train at C.Fenton. Leisure activities,30% gardening,20% T.V.,35% reading 15% other. Religion 33% of Village attend church. 90% enjoy living in the village. 66% own pets all dogs.
